summary: Samir is in love with Sonia but has unfortunately lied to her that he was already married.When she wants to meet her wife,Samir approaches his dutiful nurse Naina to play 'wife'a drama that turns out into a comedy of errors.
cast: Salman Khan|Sushmita Sen|Katrina Kaif|Sohail Khan|Arshad Warsi|Rajpal Yadav|Beena Kak|Dolly Bindra|Parth Dave|Shazia Gowariker|Arbaaz Khan|Javed Khan|Shashi Kiran|Isha Koppikar|Madhav Moghe|G.P. Singh|Vindu Dara Singh|Dinyar Tirandaz|Vivek Vaswani
title: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya
